name: Unforgiving (itch) (Morfy)
description:

game by Morfy, music by Joshua McLean

You have been sent to a weird place for unknown reasons. If you manage to escape this weird place, you'll probably still don't know what is going on, but try it anyways. It's for science.
-Tud Oreal
